name: Smartwool PhD Pro Endurance Print Crew Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Pro Endurance Print Crew Socks
description: Don't be mislead by the flowery design, these socks have the endurance to go the distance. Shred Shield™ and Indestructawool™ technology amps up the durability, and extra cushioning around the ankle adds protection on rugged trails.Made of soft merino wool, nylon, elastane and polyester.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Achilles and ankle cushion protects against trail debris.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet.
